data.description: This document defines the requirements for Exposing Network Capabilities to M2M Applications and/or M2M Service Platforms through APIs.  In addition, it contains:   Use cases where M2M Applications and/or M2M Service Platforms can leverage network capabilities to enrich the services or to streamline the operations.  Gap analysis to identify any missing Network APIs to address the above use cases.
The scope of this document is limited to the Referencer Release Definition of ENCap-M2M according to OMA Release process and the Reference Release specification baseline listed in section 5.
